metadata.synopsis: Bill Benson (Bing Crosby) and Ted Adams (Donald O'Connor) team up as headliners in an upcoming Broadway play. While vacationing separately in Paris, each actor finds his own leading lady for the show without consulting the other. Bill picks American Patsy Blair (Mitzi Gaynor), and Ted chooses French dancer Gaby Duval (Zizi Jeanmaire). When the two men run into each other on an ocean liner heading home, they must sort out the mess and decide on only one girl for the starring role.
